title: Control Character String Checker
description: This function checks if a given string consists solely of control characters. It returns TRUE if the string is valid (greater than zero in length), and FALSE if any character in the string is not a control character.
name: IS_CTRL

input.name: STR
input.description: The input string to be checked for control characters.

return_value.description: The function returns TRUE if the string consists only of control characters, otherwise FALSE.
